content: you love your fingerless gloves don t you well odds are good that your little one would love a pair too knit in a fluffy wool these mitts are bulky and warm but leave your child s fingers free to hold onto the swing set pick up sticks and pet the neighbor s kitty on a cool fall day the half-pint gloves knit up quickly all the better for making christmas gifts the moss stitch makes for a fun nubbly texture while the ribbed cuff allows plenty of room for growth so your little one should be comfy in these for a long time plus the yarn softens with age so the more often they re worn the cozier they get new the pattern now includes mama size so you can knit yourself a pair of gloves while you re at it
